Y. -L. S. Tsai

Slurm(Simple Linux Utility for Resource Management， http://slurm.schedmd.com/ )是开源的、具有容错性和高度可扩展的Linux集群超级计算系统资源管理系统.

Theoretical Research on Dark Matter

Welcome to the forefront of dark matter research, where the mysteries of the universe unfold through the collaborative efforts of interdisciplinary fields, including particle physics, astrophysics, and cosmology. As a member of the Dark Matter Theory Group at Purple Mountain Observatory (PMO), my focus lies in investigating the nature of dark matter. While the particle aspect of dark matter remains a puzzle, one thing is clear – our universe depends on it for the formation of galaxies. Therefore, the search for a signal of the dark matter particle stands as one of the most crucial tasks in fundamental physics, challenging us to answer questions about its particle mass, spin, and even the possibility of its antiparticle existence. Join us at PMO in uncovering the secrets hidden within the mysteries of dark matter!
